content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions. However, according to some players and industry experts, Ubisoft has improved its communication with players in recent years. The company has been more active on social media platforms, regularly engaging with fans and responding to feedback. Ubisoft has also introduced various feedback mechanisms, including surveys, forums, and beta testing programs, to allow players to share their thoughts on the company's games. Additionally, Ubisoft has been transparent about upcoming game releases and updates, issuing frequent updates on its development status, and sharing insights into its development process. While there is still room for improvement, it appears that Ubisoft is taking steps to better engage with its player base and address their concerns.
